channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Pay Mini
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Pay Mini

item.title: CVE-2021-25332|2024-08-03T20:03:05.299Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pay%20mini
item.description: Improper access control in Samsung Pay mini application prior to v4.0.14 allows unauthorized access to contacts information over the lockscreen in specific condition.

item.title: CVE-2021-25333|2024-08-03T20:03:05.643Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pay%20mini
item.description: Improper access control in Samsung Pay mini application prior to v4.0.14 allows unauthorized access to balance information over the lockscreen via scanning specific QR code.

item.title: CVE-2021-25331|2024-08-03T20:03:05.239Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pay%20mini
item.description: Improper access control in Samsung Pay mini application prior to v4.0.14 allows unauthorized access to balance information over the lockscreen in specific condition.
